description: Responsive business website built with React, HTML, and Tailwind CSS, optimized for speed and scalability.
highlights: Improved load speed by 3.7s; hosted on AWS for high performance
Automated workflows via JavaScript and REST APIs
Built reusable components for faster future development
note: Showcases strong front-end skills, performance optimization, and clean code practices.

description: Contributed to a responsive recipe web application using React.js and modern web development libraries during a 10-month internship.
highlights: Built a React.js app integrated with the MealDB API to display recipes
Implemented a search feature to enhance content discovery by 40%
Used useState for smooth rendering and 30% better user engagement
Designed responsive UI using CSS for cross-device compatibility
Worked with Material UI, Bootstrap, Redux Toolkit, Chakra UI, and React Router
note: Strengthened core front-end skills and gained practical experience in scalable React development.
